itunes:title: Episode 586 - Special Guest CBS "Seal Team" Actor A.J. Buckley
title: Episode 586 - Special Guest CBS "Seal Team" Actor A.J. Buckley
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest actor A.J. Buckley from CBS’s “Seal Team” to discuss his experiences playing a US Navy Seal, explains the magic that is Tom Selleck’s mustache, A.J. tells us how scoring the role of Adam Ross on CSI s...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest actor A.J. Buckley from CBS’s “Seal Team” to discuss his experiences playing a US Navy Seal, explains the magic that is Tom Selleck’s mustache, A.J. tells us how scoring the role of Adam Ross on CSI saved his life, and he ends the show with going through how much damage the COVID-19 shutdown has caused in Hollywood.
